language.entry: 女武神
Word of the foul fiends and demons has reached far and wide across the lands. These female warriors, the 女武神, have come forth to prove their worth in battle, and to bring justice to the fallen.

(The abilities of the 女武神 are of holy strength and skill. They seek to purge the darkness from the lands and replace it with holy light.)
Imbured with the strength and will of the gods, these warriors will stop at nothing to aid the weak, and deliver fallen souls onward to their makers.
这些女战士被神选中在人间执行神的意志.
Spear Thrust
Feather Flight
Holy Word
Soul Bleed
Forward Dash
For the Gods
Breath of Odin
移动
Spear Thrust
Feather Flight
Holy Word
Soul Bleed
Forward Dash
For the Gods
Breath of Odin
Old Spear
Sharpened Spear
Spear of Light
Holy Spear
Odin's Vengeance
Spear of Light
Worn Vestments
Holy Vestments
Vestments of the Gods
女武神 Vestments
女武神 Vestments of Light
Holy Vestments
ENCOURAGE
FIRST AID
ZEALOUS VIGIL
PRAY
I will deliver you to your maker.
Is your soul pure, or corrupted with darkness?
You are not worthy of divine deliverence!
In the name of the light I punish thee.
bleeding
I am not up to this task, forgive me!
The truth will ever elude me!
Grant me passage through these cursed halls�
I will not die here I say!.
Spare me this one time. Please spare me...
You are all godless, luring me to my end!
You test me? Shall I demonstrate the power of knowledge!
Stop staring at me. I know your mind!
Criminals are fools and slaves...
You mock me behind my back! Do not deny it!
Through suffering I find strength.
I shall draw power from your suffering.
My mortified flesh armors me against your hate!
You are an abomination, I will be the cleaning blade.
Ha! The truth has already burned away all feeling!
I am chosen - you are nothing!
You are a terribel leader...!
Stop soiling yourself and fight!
Blasphemers! You offend my ears AND my eyes!
That I should be made to breathe the air AND your stink.. Appalling!
The truth shall guides me, and only me.
All loot should be given to the poor!
Cast aside your gods. Only the truth can save you now.
I deserve some compensation, do I not?
I deserve to be leader!
There is no higher purpose here...
This mission frays my spirits...
Why does everyone hate me...
Shall I cut myself?
In death there shall be peace...
There is Light in the stones! And in the smiles of flies!
My eyes are on fire... So beautiful, I must gouge them out!
I knew I should have left with that strange man in a blue box!
I would have been an excellent companion! Yet he picked that stupid bride!
Fetch me a newborn lamb. I must make an offering. Now!
My faith shall be my guide!
My devotion shall burn away all blackness!
Worry not, friends. I shall lead the way!
The night is black, yes -- but the Fire burns bright.
My path is shrouded!
I am true to my path.
Power of nature course through me!
I can feel the power of starlight channel through me!.
Replace me!
Though caged in steel, my faith burns through.
I set my soul aflame. Nothing can extinguish it.
I cannot be extinguished when fire burns within.
Power is beauty!
The fire stands with you. Fear not the black.
Do not despair. As the black deepens, my power grows...
What grace has given me, let it pass to you, hero.
The holy light whispers your name. You are most blessed.
Our actions have pleased our Lord.
This is a useful trinket. Use it wisely.
As mother said... my suffering has prepared me well.
No ill wind can snuff out the power of starlight.
Has the truth forsaken us?
Deliver me to justice...
The shadows are crawling. This place is alive with evil!
That stone...it gazes at me!
Must watch their eyes. They all know of my secrets...
There is a presence here. Dark and foul.
Only through pain shall we know forgiveness!
The pain only proves my power!
Only the fools fear death!
Find some courage or burden me no more!
I judge thee guilty!
Burn and die, craven beasts!
Surely the gods have grander plans for me?
Your grunting and crying is disturbing my focus!
Silence, all! You are interrupting my plans!
Why have I been abandoned?
My power is waning...
I feel cold. Dark...
My faith shatters! Pottery cracks!
My flesh turns black! My eyes splinter!
Thye mostly come at night... mostly...
The truth is eclipsed!
No! NOOO! They are too strong!
Get back! Their eyes are cold with murder!
They will sell us to slavers if they defeat us!
Ugh! Their foul taint is anathema to my power!
Sin swirls about them... Do not breathe their air!
I am weapon of natural might!
You cannot harm me! I bear the power of our Lord!
Their lashes will fuel the hearth within!
The stars above... so many... so pretty...
There is music in the air! LA, LA-LOO, LA-LOOEEOOOAAA!
Take my arm, like the ladies on the promenade! Weee!
Where no man... or woamn... has gone before!
There is music in the air! LA, LA-LOO, LA-LOOEEOOOAAA!
Take my arm, like the ladies on the promenade! Weee!
My faith... is a lie.
Why slow the inevitable? Damnation awaits me.
What is the point of life, of faith?
I am unworthy...
I cannot lead. I am too... inexperienced.
Take my place. You are stronger than I.
I am chosen!
Their souls must suffer the flame!
I cannot see the enemy! 移动 over!
I deserve to be leader!
Curses, my hair is tangled in my gorget! A moment!
I can't read the Verses in this light! Ah, that's better.
Dark whispers bind me!
Blackness... so much paralyzing blackness...
I... I can't move... protect me!
I alone will carry on!
They mostly come at night... mostly...
The darkness plays tricks, I will hold fast.
My faith alone is the measure of power!
I walk my own path!
No. The time is not yet right.
Where there is no shadow, there can be no hope...
Shhh... not even the truth can save us now.
Call down the Flame yourself. It heeds me no longer.
I see a light in the distance... shall we dance the way there?
My gloves are soiled, and they in turn soil the Earth!
A candle in the dark! Burn, burn, BURN!
Cowards! You reject the Great Mother!
I can decide for myself! I am no scullery girl!
Hands off! I command myself, thank you!
I relish my trials, I relish my wounds!
Spill my blood! Its power shall exorcise you!
I hurl myself on the altar of faith!
You are faithless, but the truth gives me strength!
I banish you, demons!
Holy Flame, cauterize the wound of their existence!
The rewards are for me alone!
My power came at a great price. I use it as I wish.
I alone command me. None else have the right.
I am just a shadow in the dark - nothing at all.
I am no hero! Just a little girl in a woman's garb!
Poor experience begets poor decisions...
The stars and sun are of the same Light, yet I see neither...
One stunted tree in a fruiting orchard...
The Flame flickers...
I see now... Shadows are the children of Light...
These shadows are unnatural!
I have had a vision! Our deaths are imminent!
The darkness whispers of torture and misery!
Conspiracy, all around me...
Something disrupts my prayer. An unholy presence...
Are you a traitor?
Don't deny your lust, it's� fully apparent.
Pain is the gateway to power!
We die today. Consumed in the Flame of of our Savior.
Pain is the gateway to divinity!
I'll strike you all down if you get in my way.
Silence! You are acting like a fool,again!
Your rude tongues offend me, I shall rip it out.
I alone hold this pitiful group together.
What? I am certain we agreed that half the loot is mine!
Looks like I am going tohalf to go on a killing spree...
All is lost.
Dark times, these. Demons and undead plague the land.
The holy flame flickers. 'Tis a black omen.
That stupid wench at the tavern... she will sleep with any fool.
I think a trip to the brothel is in order...
Mutilation is a most fun act. Any takers?
I sacrifice myself for the good!
My blood will purify you!
I will burn in blackness... And so shall you!
Join me! Join me in the black world, denizens of evil!
Demons, all. You, my mother, my father... all.
Anoint yourself with my holy blood, and be damned.
I will not sit idly by and wait for your betrayal!
I can smell deceit. I've lived among much worse than you!
Unholy wretch! I will teach you some propriety!
Burn! Burn in effigy to starlight!
The fire burns within me! I wield it like a blade!
You all seek my attention. Foolish men.!
The Flame grants power through sacrifice!
Hear me, Flame! This blood is yours! Now grant me POWER!
Nobady shall judge me.
Flame, consume me.
HOLY LIGHT AND DEATH!
Queen for a day?
And betray my sisters? Is that what you want?
Should we stay or flee?
What cowardice.
No. I shall at least die with some dignity.
These marks reveal my strength.
The Flame fears nothing -- no pain, no defeat.
HOLD YOUR GROUND! YOU SHAME THE LIGHT!
FLEE NOW, YES! AND MAY THE FIRE DAMN YOUR COWARD SOUL!
Flame... oh Flame... why do you forsake me?
I suffer!?
They know I serve the fire! They seek my death!
I KNOW them! They are foes of truth and justice!
For that, I claim your soul!
Ungh! For these injuries, I require a greater fee!
(deep inhale) Yes... again!
It hurts, yes... But also... give me some more?
Mother! MOTHER!
Please! Be kind to me, Sisters!
No! No, please, NOOO!
Leave me be! PLEASE!
My power is attracting them! They can smell it!
I like not how that one is looking at me!
Please, please! End this life of regret! I BEG YOU!
NOOO! The Flame calls to me! Send me to the Flame!
The hissing embers... soothing to the soul.
The flames dance, and I shall dance with them.
Let me kill it! Its soul must perish by my hand!
Leave that one to me! I must cauterize its existence!
Impressive. But the sacred fire grants superior power.
... I could do better. Given half a chance.
Mother! Too late the creatures have found me...
Where are we going again?
No! NOOOO! Keep away from me!
Now I know my end has come....
I know a liar when I see one. You missed on purpose!
Traitor! You could not have missed so easily! TRAITOR!
Fairies of the forest fight better than you.
I could fight better in my under garments...
You could pay me extra you know.
Yes, distract that one while I do the real work.
I am stronger than everyone! Queen of the world!
Twinkle, twinkle, little star
No... No, please... (bursts into sobs)
(tears streaming) Spare me... spare me... spare me...
Someone has trained them... We have been tricked!
You LET yourself be hit... Why would that be?
Yes... Your pain makes you powerful.
No! Take me instead! I... I have sinned so grievously!
I am ashamed to be in your presence.
How uninspiring you are. Sigh.
You will burn for that. .. BUUURRRRRRRRNNNNNN!
(sobbing uncontrollably)
I have known despair. Yet the fear of imminent death... (shudder)
Mother, how I long for the safety of the forest...
I know a liar when I see one. They missed on purpose!
Traitor! They could not have missed so easily! TRAITOR!
I need no one by myself, I can do this alone!
You too shall burn. There is no escape.
The sacred Flame flickers... The path falls to darkness.
Get away from!.
Ha! I see your mind! Stay there, you... filthy lech.
Oh, yes, any chance to brush by me you pervert.
No. The Flame tests my fear of death. I must face it.
My resolve is weak here. I must train it more fully
Don't touch me! I know your.. type.
Oh yes, a simple touch on the shoulder now. But what later?
You touched me... you touched me... you touched me...
Your heat... it is noticeable... Does the Flame also feel?
Why? To tarnish my pure soul? You are jealous!
Stand away! I will regenerate!
I thrive on pain. It's the way of truth.
Let me endure it a bit first. It rejuvenates my soul.
If the Flame cannot suffice, then the Flame has done with me.
The power of justice will save me... I hope.
I don't need anything, not even my faith! Hahaha...
I have known much darkness. But this seems so very... inky!
Don't touch me! The Devil works through you!
The law is quite enough for me, thank you.
I deny your shamanism, kind though it may seem.
No! The law commands my pain!
Take your hands off me... unless you seek to wound me further!
You are not good enough for me.
This is my destiny, let me be.
I am well enough. Go, help the others.
Lets just end it now...
It's full of stars - beautiful and horrifying!
Nonsense! I need only bay leaf and cow urine!
The whip. The cat. The lash. The scourge.
Don't touch me! The Darkness works through you!
Verse XII: Forbid thyself from incurring debts!
I cannot trust you!
The Goddess demands my blood!
Stay back! My power wanes grows as my wounds mount!
Save your blessings! The law relishes in my suffering!
There is nothing without justice.
Stop. I am tainted enough already...
With every touch or glance, perhaps we should spend some time together...
I cannot accept help from the foolish...
I descend into the black lake below. I am lost...
Horrors! The Flame turns glaucous and crepuscular!
I judge you guilty!
Blacken our world no longer!
Begone, foul thing!
You shall suffer as I have!
Burn in the Flame!
You are DAMNED!
(gasp) It steals my breath!
Fiends from the Pit, you shall not have me!
Must it all end in such blackness?!
Breathe and be strong.
You are a true hero.
That was a noble deed.
Let me aid you.
You very nearly died. Be more careful.
You owe me... perhaps a piece of your soul in compensation?
We are filled with strength and wisdom.
I see victory in your eyes, though you are blind to it.
Holy Light give us strength...
Busy yourself elsewhere. I am stirring a stew.
Yes, I shave my legs. What of it?
Have you thread? I am making a cape of darkness.
I am ready for the end.
I... I cannot read the ritual while I shudder so...
I am trying... but the law demands justice.
There's no time for that. Evil is drawn to my power.
And reveal my secrets? I think not.
... No. This is intimacy masquerading as aid.
In your dreams buddy...
A brush with death can truly purify the spirit.
The punishment would be right to impose ten lashings instead...
In my life, suffering has been a potent motivator...
I'll not lay my hands upon you... defilers.
Oh? Shall I next bless the innkeeper's wench?
You should run into that pit of spikes... might be an improvement!
I am quite used to keeping what is mine, thank you.
No No... 75 percent of the loot is mine!
Feh! Only I can guide my actions!
No blessing in the world will make any difference now.
I will step into the dark...
The truth cannot illuminate one shrouded in black...
My tomes pages flutter on the wind - like butterflies!
They made us hate criminals...
I am tired, and the sunset is beautiful, is it not?
INVALID
INVALID
Who am I to refuse all strangers' gifts.
We are becoming too familiar. I shall cope alone.
Pain is a gift from the Flame. I cherish it.
I can take more yet. Save your folksy charms.
I see you worrying that stone. That is idolatry.
Ugh. And will you read my palm next, I bet you can't even read a book!
INVALID
INVALID
My life, wasted. There is no power in this.
I shall never feel the starlight again...
I can't hear you, I've fled this place on wings of shadow!
Is that the moon or sun... I'm confused!
The law forbid me to eat this... whatever this is.
How many of these damn lines are there?
Way too many...
I am the best!
Meh... I can do this by myself.
Why do they keep attacking me!
I will die now...
Into the darkness...
Temptation is a wild snake; its venom, my release.
I'll not eat that! It swarms with dragonflies!
